step_content.text:
**This tool will guide you through the AFTER Training material and enable you to certify that you have been completed the necessary training for the AFTER Study.**

When you press START below, each step will be presented in full screen mode to remove distractions. If you would prefer your normal view you can change back using the fullscreen button in the header.

Follow the simple step by step process, reading to the bottom of each page before you move on to the next.

When you have viewed all of the steps you will be asked to answer some questions and complete a questionnaire after which you will receive a certificate of completion for the training.
